
## get zone ip blocks

ip blocks source from : https://www.ipdeny.com/ipblocks/


```shell
 curl api.fungit.org/v1/ip/getIpBlock?zone=Beijing
{
  "code" : 200,
  "msg" : "success",
  "data" : "1.116.0.0/15,1.202.0.0/15,39.96.0.0/13,39.104.0.0/14,40.72.0.0/15,40.125.128.0/17,42.80.0.0/15,42.159.0.0/16,47.92.0.0/14,49.4.0.0/14,59.110.0.0/15,60.205.0.0/16,61.48.0.0/14,61.148.0.0/15,101.200.0.0/15,103.9.8.0/22,103.25.156.0/22,103.36.96.0/22,103.45.128.0/22,103.45.132.0/22,103.45.136.0/22,103.45.140.0/22,103.45.144.0/22,103.45.148.0/22,103.45.152.0/22,103.45.156.0/22,103.105.200.0/22,103.139.212.0/23,103.255.140.0/22,106.120.0.0/13,110.176.0.0/13,111.192.0.0/12,111.221.28.0/24,114.240.0.0/12,115.182.0.0/16,116.204.0.0/17,116.205.0.0/16,120.46.0.0/16,120.48.0.0/15,121.89.0.0/16,122.115.224.0/19,123.56.0.0/15,123.112.0.0/12,123.249.0.0/16,124.64.0.0/15,124.126.0.0/15,125.33.0.0/16,125.35.0.0/17,125.73.0.0/16,139.217.0.0/16,139.219.0.0/16,159.226.0.0/16,180.212.0.0/15,182.48.96.0/19,182.92.0.0/16,183.91.144.0/20,183.128.0.0/11,202.89.232.0/21,202.96.0.0/18,218.24.0.0/15,221.216.0.0/13,222.128.0.0/14",

## setup windows firewall

```
netsh advfirewall firewall show rule name=all > c:\\rule-file.txt
# find Remote Desktop rule

netsh advfirewall firewall set rule name="Remote Desktop(TCP-In)" new remoteip=1.116.0.0/15,1.202.0.0/15,39.96.0.0/13,39.104.0.0/14,40.72.0.0/15,40.125.128.0/17,42.80.0.0/15,42.159.0.0/16,47.92.0.0/14,49.4.0.0/14,59.110.0.0/15,60.205.0.0/16,61.48.0.0/14,61.148.0.0/15,101.200.0.0/15,103.9.8.0/22,103.25.156.0/22,103.36.96.0/22,103.45.128.0/22,103.45.132.0/22,103.45.136.0/22,103.45.140.0/22,103.45.144.0/22,103.45.148.0/22,103.45.152.0/22,103.45.156.0/22,103.105.200.0/22,103.139.212.0/23,103.255.140.0/22,106.120.0.0/13,110.176.0.0/13,111.192.0.0/12,111.221.28.0/24,114.240.0.0/12,115.182.0.0/16,116.204.0.0/17,116.205.0.0/16,120.46.0.0/16,120.48.0.0/15,121.89.0.0/16,122.115.224.0/19,123.56.0.0/15,123.112.0.0/12,123.249.0.0/16,124.64.0.0/15,124.126.0.0/15,125.33.0.0/16,125.35.0.0/17,125.73.0.0/16,139.217.0.0/16,139.219.0.0/16,159.226.0.0/16,180.212.0.0/15,182.48.96.0/19,182.92.0.0/16,183.91.144.0/20,183.128.0.0/11,202.89.232.0/21,202.96.0.0/18,218.24.0.0/15,221.216.0.0/13,222.128.0.0/14


netsh advfirewall firewall set rule name="Remote Desktop(UDP-In)" new remoteip=1.116.0.0/15,1.202.0.0/15,39.96.0.0/13,39.104.0.0/14,40.72.0.0/15,40.125.128.0/17,42.80.0.0/15,42.159.0.0/16,47.92.0.0/14,49.4.0.0/14,59.110.0.0/15,60.205.0.0/16,61.48.0.0/14,61.148.0.0/15,101.200.0.0/15,103.9.8.0/22,103.25.156.0/22,103.36.96.0/22,103.45.128.0/22,103.45.132.0/22,103.45.136.0/22,103.45.140.0/22,103.45.144.0/22,103.45.148.0/22,103.45.152.0/22,103.45.156.0/22,103.105.200.0/22,103.139.212.0/23,103.255.140.0/22,106.120.0.0/13,110.176.0.0/13,111.192.0.0/12,111.221.28.0/24,114.240.0.0/12,115.182.0.0/16,116.204.0.0/17,116.205.0.0/16,120.46.0.0/16,120.48.0.0/15,121.89.0.0/16,122.115.224.0/19,123.56.0.0/15,123.112.0.0/12,123.249.0.0/16,124.64.0.0/15,124.126.0.0/15,125.33.0.0/16,125.35.0.0/17,125.73.0.0/16,139.217.0.0/16,139.219.0.0/16,159.226.0.0/16,180.212.0.0/15,182.48.96.0/19,182.92.0.0/16,183.91.144.0/20,183.128.0.0/11,202.89.232.0/21,202.96.0.0/18,218.24.0.0/15,221.216.0.0/13,222.128.0.0/14
